column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Monday February 15 for the President's Day holiday.
Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday February 16 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: I-75N at Exit 49 in Laurel Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown until further notice due to a serious collision near the 55 MM in Rockcastle Co.

column3: I-75N at Exit 49 in Laurel Co:
column4: Detour:  Exit 49 to US-25N to Exit 59, then back on to I-75N.
